feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, referenced files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lookup file containing prewritten summaries for many frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and script tag loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component applying safe-area padding and wrapping GameScreen with an orientation guard.
frontend/src/game/effects/Explosion.tsx: Explosion component rendering hit, player, or bomb variants with deterministic ember patterns.
frontend/src/game/entities/Bullet.tsx: Bullet visual component showing a small rotating projectile with glow and trailing effect.
frontend/src/game/entities/Obstacle.tsx: Renders a scalable hexagon obstacle with boss-dependent styling and glow effects based on position and size.
frontend/src/game/entities/PlayerJet.tsx: Displays the player jet with rotation, thruster animations, and detailed SVG body rendering.
frontend/src/game/GameScreen.tsx: Core game controller managing state, movement, physics, collisions, leveling, and rendering of all entities.
frontend/src/game/hooks/useJoystickSensi: React hook managing joystick sensitivity with localStorage persistence and validation.
frontend/src/game/physics/bounds.ts: Provides functions for clamping, reflecting, and checking boundary conditions for entity positions.
frontend/src/game/physics/obstacleCollis: Resolves elastic collisions between circular obstacles, applying separation and damped impulse responses.
frontend/src/game/physics/playerObstacle: Determines whether a playerâ€“obstacle collision is a full hit based on overlap depth thresholds.
frontend/src/game/physics/vectors.ts: Utility functions for angle-to-vector conversion, pixel-to-percent velocity conversion, and offset position calculation.
frontend/src/game/Playfield.tsx: Playfield wrapper rendering the game border, corner accents, and background grid.
frontend/src/game/ui/GameOverlay.tsx: Renders the game HUD, controls, boss bar, joystick UI, and sensitivity slider depending on game state.
frontend/src/game/ui/OrientationGuard.ts: Enforces landscape mode and displays a rotate prompt when the device is in portrait orientation.
frontend/src/game/ui/ShootButton.tsx: Renders a fire button that tracks pointer events to trigger start and end firing actions.
frontend/src/game/ui/VirtualJoystick.tsx: Implements a touch-controlled joystick with deadzone, pointer tracking, and movement callbacks.
frontend/src/game/utils/joystickMovement: Converts joystick displacement into normalized direction and curved speed factor with deadzone handling.
frontend/src/game/utils/levelTimer.ts: Provides functions to compute per-level countdown duration and format time values.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder indicating the game performs no backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive theme variables including game-specific colors and effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query and identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom game colors, utilities, plugins, and container behavior.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing joystick sensitivity features, and a pending request to adjust sensitivity. Stores project settings, issues, notes, and feature versions.
